issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is not a regression,reproducible in 2.1.1 GA.

Description:
1.Replace the app.js with the app.js of the default titanium mobile project.
2.Package it for mobile web.
3.Host it using the apache server.
4.In the mobile device launch the browser.
5.Type in the ip address of your mac used to host the apache server and hit go.
6.The app will fireup in the browser of the device.
7.Change the orientation of the device.
8.You will see that the tableviewrows disappear,the only way to to get them again is reload the app.

Actual result:
The tableviewrows disappear after orientation change.

Expected result:
The tableviewrows should not disappear.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: TableViewRows : TableViewRows with Ti.UI disappear after changing the orientation of the device.
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium studio : 2.1.1.201207271312
SDK version : 2.2.0.v20120814134112
Android 4.0.4 - default ,chrome 18.0 , firefox 14.0.1
Iphone 5.1.1 - safari mobile

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
